about_the_game:
Abrakajumpa is a 2D platformer game set in a fantasy world where you have to reach the top of the level through jumping. Facing difficult jumps and obstacles, you must traverse these levels through strategy and Abrakajumpa is a 2D platformer game set in a fantasy world where you have to reach the top of the level through jumping. Facing difficult jumps and obstacles, you must traverse these levels through strategy and skill.

-As you climb higher, be cautious of falling! A small mistake will cost you precious progress.

-Time your jumps precisely and charge them carefully to avoid falling.

-Nail-biting jumps and special platforms block your path. Learn what they do and overcome them!

-Enjoy a variety of maps which include vanilla, procedural generation, and stealth.

-Jump your way to the top and claim the fastest time on the leaderboards.

name: Abrakajumpa

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Jump your way to the top!
